content.rendered:
• Customer Reviews: 
    4.5 out of 5 stars    423 ratings

excerpt.rendered: Diindolylmethane, Or Dim For Short, Is A Plant Indole—A Plant Compound With Health-Promoting Properties,Dim Contributes To A Better Metabolism In The Most Natural Way Possible By Working With Your Own Hormones And Adjusting Their Action To Avoid Hormonal Imbalance. Dim Produces More ‘Good’ Estrogen Metabolites, Which Compete With Testosterone For Protein Binding, Helping To Maintain A Slightly Higher ‘Free’ Testosterone Level. Free Testosterone Is Testosterone That Is More Active.
